name: DiceMe Up
description:
USE SPACE BAR TO PLAY AND STOP THE DICE.

Rule Points:

  • * 5 single die = 50 points
  • * 1 single die  = 100 points
  • * Three of ANY SAME die = score x 100
  •   OR THREE of SAME '1' die = score x 1000
  • * FOUR of ANY same die = score x 200
  •    OR FOUR of SAME '1' die = score x 2000
